title: Is Azir's model smaller now?? [RIOT please confirm for me]
body:
He wasn't in the patch notes as being smaller, but he was in the PBE, and he feels smaller in game now, his soldiers are actually bigger than him which feels really weird, I'm sure it hasn't always been that way.

is it just me being weird or was it excluded from the patch notes?
can someone from riot please confirm for me?

replies.body: I believe it was on the PBE so it likely went through in this recent patch, but there was a whole bunch of model size updates. To name a few I remember, Aether Wing Kayle up, Malphite up, and Kalista down. They're basically going through and equalising them all so that the human champs are all roughly the same size, monster champs that are supposed ot be big like malp/cho  are bigger etc etc (all within the balance confines they have of course as model size affects how big they can make the hitboxes)
noticed it as well, same thing with udyr
